name: liberator-web-frontend
description: Angularjs powered frontend for Liberator project <https://github.com/libreoss/liberator>

scripts.start: npm install && parallelshell 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve' 'npm run livereload'
scripts.build:js: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/* app/dist/ && browserify app/scripts/app.js > app/dist/liberator.js
scripts.build: mkdir app/dist -p && npm run build:js && npm run build:bootstrap

author: Mladen Stepanic <mladen.stepanic@gmail.com>
